maqras.text: O people vos est unus need DEUS dum DEUS est in non need anyone the Multus Praiseworthy
He testimentum He get rid de vos substitute new creation
Hoc non est too difficult pro DEUS

Non anima carry sins alias anima. Anima loaded sins implores alias bear part de its load nullus alius anima carry any part de it et they related Unus people heed tuus warnings est those reverence their Dominus et when alone in their privacy observe Contact Prayers (Salat)! Whoever purifies his anima perfecit ita his suus bonus To DEUS est ultimus destiny
blind seer non est equalis
Nor est darkness light
Nor est coolness de shade heat sun
Nor est vivus denatus; DEUS causa whomever He testimentum hear Vos non factus hearers those graves
Vos est non multus than warner
Nos sent vos truth bearer bonus news alias prout warner. Omnis community receive warner
Si they disbelieve vos those ante them alias disbelieved Their messengers iit them clear proofs Psalms enlightening scriptures
Subsequently ego punished those disbelieved quam terrible est My retribution
Vos non realize DEUS sends down caelum aqua whereby nos produce perfecit fruits de various colors Et montis habet different colors peaks est albus rufus some alius color ravens est niger
Alias people animals livestock advenit various colors Hoc est people enim reverence DEUS est those est knowledgeable. DEUS est Almighty Forgiving
Surely those recite book DEUS observe Contact Prayers (Salat) noster provisions them they spend - secretly publicly - Desponsatus investment nunquam loses
He recompense them generously multiply His blessings them! He Forgiving Appreciative
quod nos revealed vos in hoc scripture est truth consummating totus proximus scriptures! DEUS est fully Cognizant DE His SERVUS Seer

Nos passed scripture generation generation nos allowed whomever nos chose noster servus receive it Subsequently some de them wronged their anima others upheld it unus part de temporis dum others est eager work righteousness prout deus testimentum hoc est major triumph
They iniit gardens Eden they adorned bracelets de gold pearls their garments it factus silk
They dictus Praise DEUS removing totus noster injuria! Noster Dominus Forgiving Appreciative
He admitted nos abode eternal bliss His gratia. Nunquam perfecit nos bored hic nunquam perfecit nos tired
Prout pro those disbelieve they incurred fire Hell ubi they nunquam clausum decessus nor est retribution ever commuted them. Nos sic requite the unappreciative

They scream therein Noster Dominus vos get nos out de hic nos work righteousness works nos used perfecit nos non dedit vos life-long chance continuous reminders those take heed Vos non receive warner? Ergo taste (consequences). transgressors habet non 1 help them
DEUS est Knower future DE CAELUM TERRA. He est Knower totus innermost thoughts

He est Unus factus vos inheritors terra. Subsequently whoever chooses disbelieve perfecit ita his suus detriment. disbelief disbelievers unus augments their Dominus abhorrence them. disbelief disbelievers plunges them deeper loss
